Rod Pavez wrote:

> There is a type of toy like a puzzle that originated in Japan. The 
> pieces are made of metal or ceramic and triangular shaped, usually 
> they are black or some dark color. Children entertain themselves by 
> making shapes with them.
> Do any of you know the name of this? If you have any information on it 
> please let me know. Thanks.

   Sounds like you're talking about tangram, but that's Chinese, not 
Japanese in origin.
